content.en: Optimizing aerodynamics: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms, specifically neural networks and genetic algorithms, to optimize the design of aerodynamic structures such as nozzles and airfoils. By combining these algorithms with computational fluid dynamics and other techniques, they aim to improve the efficiency and performance of these structures. Machine learning techniques, including deep neural networks and Gaussian processes, are also being used to reduce computational time and enhance data efficiency in aerodynamic design optimization.
content.da: Optimering af aerodynamik: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer, specifikt neurale netværk og genetiske algoritmer, for at optimere designet af aerodynamiske strukturer såsom dyser og løftede flyvinger. Ved at kombinere disse algoritmer med computational fluid dynamics og andre teknikker, sigter de mod at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af disse strukturer. Maskinlæringsteknikker, herunder dybe neurale netværk og Gaussiske processer, anvendes også for at reducere beregningstiden og forbedre dataeffektiviteten i optimeringen af aerodynamisk design.
